src_original: marīcyupamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ kleśatṛṣṇāsaṃbhūtaḥ /  kadalīskandhopamo 'yaṃ kāyo 'sārakatvāt /  yantrabhūto batāyaṃ kāyo 'sthisnāyuvinibaddhaḥ /  māyopamo 'yaṃ kāyo viparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ /  svapnopamo 'yaṃ kāyo vitathadarśanaḥ /  pratibhāsopamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ pūrvakarmapratibhāsatayā saṃdṛśyate /  pratiśrutkopamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ pratyayādhīnatvāt /
meghopamo 'yaiḥ kāyaś cittākulavigamalakṣaṇaḥ /  vidyutsadṛśo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgayukto 'navasthitaḥ /
tgt_original: 須臾變滅。 是身如電。

src_original: niśceṣṭo 'yaṃ kāyo vātayantrayukto vartate /  rikto 'yaṃ kāyo 'śucipūtisaṃcayaḥ /
tgt_original: 是身不淨。 穢惡充滿。 是身為虛偽。
